publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5821 Cathie Craigie: Whitelees Rocking for the Environment—That the Parliament congratulates theWhitelees School of Rockof Whitelees Primary School in Cumbernauld for highlighting climate change through song; commends the nine to 11-year-olds who are part of the School of Rock for driving toward the school’s fourth green flag for its environment work; further congratulates the staff for their unstinting support for the climate change agenda, and,finally, wishes all concerned luck inaiming fortheir fourth green flag.

S3M-5821 Cathie Craigie: Whitelees Rocking for the Environment—That the Parliament congratulates theWhitelees School of Rockof Whitelees Primary School in Cumbernauld for highlighting climate change through song; commends the nine to 11-year-olds who are part of the School of Rock for driving toward the school’s fourth green flag for its environment work; further congratulates the staff for their unstinting support for the climate change agenda, and,finally, wishes all concerned luck inaiming fortheir fourth green flag. Supported by: Bill Butler*, Jackie Baillie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Karen Whitefield*, Stuart McMillan*, Trish Godman*
S3M-5821 Whitelees Rocking for the Environment (lodged on 25 February 2010) Bill Kidd*, Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-5821 Whitelees Rocking for the Environment (lodged on 25 February 2010) Hugh O’Donnell*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-5821 Whitelees Rocking for the Environment (lodged on 25 February 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh Henry*
